title: Technology-Enhanced Integrated STEM Mathematics Instructional Design Capability Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational math education theory and pre-service teacher training experience
context.additional_context: A program focused on cultivating preservice teachers' ability to design integrated STEM lessons applicable to real classroom situations in a smartphone-based environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five principles of competency-based, student-centered integrated STEM instruction design: systematic training, technology integration, learning analytics utilization, iterative design, and collaboration-based development.
Learners can create a math-focused integrated STEM lesson plan using mobile learning design tools.
Learners can improve their instructional design drafts three or more times based on peer feedback and learning analytics data to finalize the output.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
